meanings.definition: The act of not enforcing a rule or law.
meanings.sent1: The nonenforcements of parking regulations led to chaos in the streets.
meanings.sent2: The nonenforcements of safety rules resulted in accidents.
meanings.sent3: The nonenforcements of bedtime rules made the kids think they could stay up all night.
meanings.sent4: The nonenforcements of traffic laws turned the city into a free-for-all.
meanings.sent5: The nonenforcements of school rules made the students feel like they could do whatever they wanted.

meanings.definition: The lack of enforcement of a regulation or policy.
meanings.sent1: The nonenforcements of the dress code caused students to wear whatever they pleased.
meanings.sent2: The nonenforcements of the speed limit led to reckless driving.
meanings.sent3: The nonenforcements of the 'no pets allowed' policy resulted in a zoo-like atmosphere in the building.
meanings.sent4: The nonenforcements of the noise regulations turned the neighborhood into a constant party.
meanings.sent5: The nonenforcements of the attendance policy made it seem like skipping class was acceptable.
